review: If you're getting this to play movies in a hotel, for get it.  I've never been able to connect to my hotel network - period.  The device was a waste of money. What a waste of time and money!!!!  The device is worthless for the purpose for which it is intended, so now I'm watching my movies on a 7" screen.  I'd give it a 0 rating if I could!
